newsitem.title: USA: Access Solutions says to buy PaperClip.
newsitem.headline: Access Solutions says to buy PaperClip.

text.p: Access Solutions International Inc said Wednesday agreed to buy PaperClip Software Inc for 1,544,438 shares of Access Solution's common stock plus an equivalent number of Class B Warrants.
Each warrant will entitle the holder to purchase one share of Access Solution's common stock at an exercise price of $6.00 per share, the company said.
Access Solutions said it expects the deal to be completed by August.

"Both our large COLD end-user customers and resellers have expresssed strong interest in purchasing document management and imaging products," said Access Solutions president and chief executive Robert Stone.
Access Solutions designs, develops, manufactures and markets mainframe information storage and retrieval systems, while PaperClip markets software products to organize documents.
